rooms.name: beginning
rooms.getText:
You find yourself in a long hallway, warmly lit by bulbs lining the walls. Small signs hang above open doorways.
You see:
TOY ROOM
OFFICE
WORKSHOP
[Enter rooms by typing 'enter', and then the room you'd like to enter. Look at things by typing 'examine'. Pick things up by typing 'pick'. (Pickables will glow, though finding them all might take some examining...)]
[If you get lost, type 'go back' and you'll find yourself back here.]

results.successText: This hallway seems to go on forever... You're not sure where you are, but it's certain that this location isn't in physical space.

results.failText: The door is locked with an access code!
The door is locked with an access code!
The door is locked with an access code!

results.successText: You pick up the statue. It feels heavy in your hands, and there's something hanging off the bottom.
You take the note from the bottom of the statue.
You look at the note and find an access code: '14052.'
results.failText: You have no note to look at!

rooms.name: workshop
rooms.getText: You enter the workshop. There's a long metallic bench, lined with monitors and keyboards.

results.successText: You exit the workshop and return to the hallway.

rooms.name: toyroom
rooms.getText:
Toys litter the floor, and in the center of the room is a massive toy chest.
Some of the toys are worn to near unrecognizability; some are barely used, especially the poor guitar, ukulele, and harmonica; some look like they are only half-made.
A plaque with some writing hangs on the opposite wall.

results.successText: You exit the toy room and return to the hallway.

rooms.name: office
rooms.getText:
It's pretty messy, but the hanging sign that says 'DO NOT CLEAN' makes you think there might be some inexplicable internal logic.
You see a small hand-bound leather book among the junk on the desks. It glows in a pale purple light.

results.successText: You exit the office and return to the hallway.
